name: Cápsula de memória
description:
"Cápsula de memória" is part of a paintings series on photography and portrays the alzheimer through art, my grandmother has the disease so I decided to eternalize her legacy. 
"People recognize the part of the story they share with other people and shared memory offers a guarantee that everything is as it should be. But sometimes the course is twisted, the memory capsules that link the verb tenses fall into emptiness and the sense of linearity is lost.”
oil on printed photography, 40x60cm, 2021
